main_definition: The things that are included or contained within something, such as a document, package, or container.

meanings_and_examples.definition: What is inside a physical object like a box or envelope
meanings_and_examples.example: The contents of the package were delivered to my doorstep.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The material, information, and ideas found in written work or document
meanings_and_examples.example: I skimmed through the contents of the article before deciding it was relevant to me.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A list of items, usually organized alphabetically, included in a publication like a magazine or newspaper
meanings_and_examples.example: The back cover contains an index listing all the names and topics covered in this edition's contents.

meanings_and_examples.definition: What is stored within digital storage devices such as hard drives, USB flash drives, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: I checked my device to see what its contents were before I sold it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The substance or essence of something
meanings_and_examples.example: While the specific details may have changed over time, the core contents of our traditions remain intact.
